data.subTitle: 添加打包分析
data.content:
const BundleAnalyzerPlugin = require("webpack-bundle-analyzer")
  .BundleAnalyzerPlugin;

module.exports = {
  chainWebpack: config => {
    // 打包分析
    if (IS_PROD) {
      config.plugin("webpack-report").use(BundleAnalyzerPlugin, [
        {
          analyzerMode: "static"
        }
      ]);
    }
  }
};
